profile: Visit our new website: www.art-metal.ca We are a family owned and operated company manufacturing wrought iron railings and other iron products based in Toronto, Ontario. Our mission is to provide you with highest quality iron products at a low cost and to ensure your satisfaction with our product and service. Our core value: In today's construction business industry we encounter many companies who simply rush, cheat, and work around the right way of doing things. Having work done with utmost integrity, honesty, and compassion is our number one value in a project. We provide lifetime warranty on galvanized iron work. We also provide services for: fences & gates, patios & decks, floor refinishing

With franchises in over 60 cities in Canada, we’ve designed and built over 25,000 beautiful composite decks and have worked hard to earn our reputation as the best in the deck business.

To us, every project we undertake is not just a deck – it’s a Hickory Dickory Deck. That means it’s constructed to the highest standards using the best materials. It means it’s built by professional carpenters and craftspeople who adhere to the Hickory Dickory Decks philosophy and are careful to represent our brand well, every day. profile:
Whether you’re a do-it-yourselfer and need posts or deck footings, or you’re looking for a complete fence solution, GNFP is here to assist you!

The hardest part about building your own fence or deck is digging the post holes. Many new construction sites, as well as existing yards, are filled with rock and other debris, making post hole construction a real problem.

Don't pay to rent a dangerous gas auger and still end up struggling for days in the hot sun! Call on the experts at GNFP!

profile: ROYAL Decks Co. is a custom decking company priding itself in high quality of work and complete customer satisfaction. ROYAL Decks Co. focuses on specialty materials, such as exotic hardwoods, low maintenance materials and high grades of cedar. ROYAL Decks Co. offers a complete solution for a homeowner from custom designs to the execution of the project. ROYAL Decks Co. was founded in Burlington Ontario and quickly grew to serve all surrounding areas of Toronto and also Calgary since 2008 onwards. We are successful because we take every deck builder project as if it was the only one, although we build hundreds each year. Our success is based on the following five core values: Great design Quality work Build on time and budget Provide great warranty Safety Great design In order for the deck to be great, it has to be usable, look great and fulfill all of the customer's expectations. With our extensive experience, we will work with you to design the deck that will serve the purpose, according to your needs. This means getting the right size and shape of the deck, getting the right features and selecting the right materials. We work with many materials of different properties and we are sure to find one that will work for you. Build quality We have only the most experienced carpenters. Our carpenters have been in construction most of their lives and they build decks not because they have to, but because they love it. All of our decks have to meet very strict ROYAL Decks Co. quality control on top of any building code requirements. Our decks not only meet building code, they exceed it. Build on time and on budget Our estimate includes time frame when the project will be started, how long it will take and how much exactly it will cost. We strive to make the construction process an enjoyable experience. That is why we take these extra seriously. Provide great warranty We are proud to give one of the best warranties in the business to every deck that carries ROYAL Decks Co. name on it. We stand behind the work that we do. To see details about our warranty please visit our warranty website. Safety Safety is our utter most requirement doing any work. We carry both WCB and WSIB, to date without a single claim. We keep our workplace neat and organized to minimize any injuries. Sincerely, Miro
service_area: Brampton, Concord, Etobicoke, Markham, Mississauga, Newmarket, North York, Oakville, Richmond Hill, Scarborough, Thornhill, Toronto, Unionville, Vaughan, Woodbridge

profile:
Welcome to Craft-Bilt Materials Ltd
We began operating in April of 1992 after buying assets from Wrisco Ltd. Wrisco was a major supplier of aluminum patio covers, enclosure material and awnings for over 30 years. For 17 years we operated from the old Wrisco location, a 32,000 square foot facility in the Toronto suburb of Markham. In February of 2009, we moved to our current custom designed, 40,000 square foot facility in Ajax, Ontario (just East of Toronto).

Craft-Bilt’s main business is contractor sales of sunrooms, railing, waterproof decking, awnings and patio covers. We manufacture railing kits, canopy kits and sunroom kits. Our line of retractable fabric shades includes: fabric awnings, motorized screens, free standing canopies and canopies for pergolas.

We take a great deal of pride in the engineering behind our products. Proper engineering is important for obtaining building permits. You will find that Craft-Bilt products exceed the industry standard.

Our sales are primarily to customers in Canada. If you are interested in sunrooms or shade products in the USA, please contact Craft-Bilt Manufacturing Co. in Pennsylvania. They have been producing sunrooms in the United States for over 40 years.

Check us out on these sites as well:
https://www.facebook.com/craft.bilt.materials.ltd
https://twitter.com/CraftBilt
https://www.houzz.com/pro/craftbilt/
https://www.youtube.com/c/Craft-bilt

profile:
Dreaming of an outdoor deck? We can build your deck on time. Most builders will tell you they build in one day, We at Pro Deck Builder make sure all details are perfect. We don’t rush, we make quality work for our customers. We keep the area clean to make sure our customers are happy. Pro Deck Builder will build large and small decks and we do extra also like, flower pots, garden boxes, bench, trellis, gazebos, pergolas, sheds and frames. For every deck we build, we also stain them. Pro Deck Builder will also remove the old deck and bring it to the dump. Call Pro Deck Builder today to give you and your family ideal, nice, new family space outside.

***

Pro Deck Builder will give you the best price and service with a five year warranty. We are serving south western Ontario to the following places: Oakville, Burlington, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Woodbridge, Vaughan, Georgetown, Etobicoke, Ancaster, Hamilton and Waterdown.

***

We specialize in:Ground decks, upper decks, with roof, pool decks, hot tub decks and more. Pressure treated lumber, Cedar lumber and Composite deck materials.

profile:
A Full Range of Personalized Design-Build Services

Specialized in multi-room renovations and design, kitchen renovations and design, bathroom renovations and design, basement renovations and design, deck and fence building and design.

Proven to be one of the top home renovation companies in Hamilton, Milanos All-Star Construction Inc. consistently delivers excellent service and high-quality results. We start with quality materials, and we take the time to educate our clients about the differences between choosing hardwood or laminate, marble or granite. Next, we follow the project management method for custom renovations, which means open communication and fair prices, often at wholesale cost. Finally, we set deadlines, and we meet them! Our goal is to cause as little disturbance to your life as possible. Our clients come first in all that we do, so you can count on us to be there every step of the way, whether it’s giving you an update at the end of every day or honouring or maintaining a clean workspace.

Whether you are looking for upscale complete home renovations, a one of a kind custom built home, or perhaps a room specific renovation such as a kitchen, basement, bathroom & ensuite or custom cabinetry and millwork built-ins; Milanos All-Star Construction Inc. offers a full range of services to suit your needs.

Give us a call today to book your FREE consultation.

Process
Get a professional assessment.
Plans/Drawings
Scope of Work/Cost Estimate
Prepare for budgeting and planning.
Presentation of Design & Budget.
Sign Contract & Provide Deposit
Permit Application.
Begin Construction.
No Hidden Costs
Once we work together to understand your dream renovation goals, we put together a detailed plan and proposal that includes all costs and expenses in your project. That way you’re never met with an unexpected expense during or after your renovation.

Quality Workmanship
Our quality workmanship can be seen throughout Ontario. We have completed many custom building projects for our clients throughout Hamilton, Stoney Creek, Burlington, Oakville, Binbrook, Grismby and Niagara Region. We are committed to excellence, our Customer Satisfaction Is Our Standard.

Our Services:

RENOVATIONS

Home Renovations, Additions And New Builds Done Right. Every Time.
We at Milanos All-Star Construction Inc. specialize in renovations and provide quality workmanship with competitive pricing!
We have an absolute passion for the renovation industry and we exceed in providing our clients with the utmost communication with a 100% satisfaction guarantee.
Our team has over 15 years of experience and together we will deliver your dream in to reality. At Milanos All-Star Construction Inc., complete customer satisfaction is our only concern.


KITCHENS

Milanos All-star Construction Inc. is Hamilton’s award-winning Kitchen Renovation Company of choice.
Milanos All-star Construction Inc. has the experience, know how and skills to get the job done, and the track record to back it up.
We believe a well-built, well-designed kitchen speaks for itself. Our strength is making kitchen renovations easy by eliminating the guesswork. Our customers appreciate the simplicity we offer where everything they need can be picked under one roof and installed by our very own in-house trades.


BATHROOM

We provide the skill and craftsmanship you need to create the bathroom you’ve been dreaming about.
We are bathroom renovation specialists in Hamilton Area and provide the craftsmanship and planning so you get what you want.

Custom Vanities
Whirlpool Bath and Spa
Custom Shower Enclosures
Custom Tile and Stone
Radiant Floor Heating

BASEMENTS

Milanos All-Star Construction Inc. Hamilton’s Premier Basement Renovation Company.
Milanos All-star Construction Inc. is top basement renovation contractors in Hamilton, we consistently delivers excellent service and high-quality results. Our passion for building new custom basement projects drives us, reflecting who we are as a company and what we do for our clients. Whether your goal is to have extra space for your family, a comfortable office to work from home or just a place to relax, the possibilities are endless. As basement experts, we take this seriously. Our team is creative, efficient and meticulous.


OPEN CONCEPT STRUCTURAL DESIGN

Looking for a Open Concept Design?

Our team removes the guesswork that is typical among home building and renovations. Beyond the aesthetics, our approach to designs ensures highly accurate estimates and clarity of the results before the project begins.
From new builds to renovations, we will manage all the details throughout every stage of the project. We will keep you updated with the progress and ensure the site remains clean and secure.



FRAMING

Need a skilled carpenter to finish your home projects?
We have the skill and experience you’ve been looking for. We tackle all-size projects from an entire house to a single doorway.


PAINTING

Hamilton Painters that get job done Right!
A new coat of paint will bring new life to any space. Let us show you how our affordable Hamilton painting services can bring life back to your space!
Our Painting is done by experts who know what it takes to deliver excellent results. We do not subcontract our painting projects, which means consistent results and service every time.


FENCES

If you need to build a fence, we can get the job done. Wood or composite anything is possible.
Whether you need commercial fencing, residential fencing, automated gates or a high quality, affordable access control system we have what you need.
We have years of experience in woodworking, we take pride in our work & love what we do.


DECKS

Nothing is too big or too small, from terraced decks to a small porch out front. We can tackle any type of deck project you may have.


LANDSCAPING

Landscapes big and small, we offer value-packed outdoor enhancements.
Our goal is to ensure you are satisfied with the results we provide – that’s why our landscaping services are diverse and flexible. We can customize your landscape design and construct your outdoor yard to how you desire it to be. Our landscaping serves in Hamilton, and surrounding areas! Schedule a meeting with our landscape designer today.
We specialize in one of a kind outdoor living spaces with a focus on superior craftsmanship and personally ensuring our clients satisfaction. We’re proud to go the extra mile to help you create a personal oasis that is built to last. From design to completion every step of your project is completed by owner and builder Milan Luka, ensuring your project is built to the highest level of quality with unmatched craftsmanship.

profile:
Hello Viewer! 

We offer full turn key solutions for interiors and exterior renovations for a variety of building types. Working at a range of scales, from custom renovation projects for residential market to adaptive reuse of small commercial buildings. The team lists beauty, practicality, and social and environmental sustainability as essentials for ‘healthier and happier buildings’.  


We specialize in the design and renovation management of a variety of spaces which can differ in size and function.  It is through our free consultation that  a picture is painted on what your project and budgetary requirements are.   We will hold your hand as tight as you require and ensure that we listen to your wants and needs.  Once we have a clear picture of scope and budget, our team will estimate and design your space for you accordingly with years of experience and education backing our every decision.   


There is no project to small and no renovation project to large for us to handle.  
-We work with a variety of agents who have clients moving into their new 2 story properties or condos which have very tight time lines.  We have accomplished full 3 story (including basement) renovations in 5 weeks flats when necessary.  
-We have many recurring clients which use our services for each challenge they face.  If you aren't ready to do a full project in a single swing,  we can help you break down the project into proper stepping stones to spend where necessary and when necessary. 


We are a phone call or email away and would be honored to work with you.

profile:
There are too many renovation companies in the industry but there is not many like The Renovation Monsters.
Our home renovation business serves Toronto and surrounding areas including Oakville, Hamilton, Mississauga, Brampton, Richmond, Thornhill, Maple. 

We have been in business for over 15 years and we understand that your home is a special place and we promise to always do our best to ensure customer satisfaction. 

Since day one our mission has been to fully understand each customers home renovation needs.

As a full-service contractor, we have the experience and proven skills to take on all your home renovation requirements and complete the project so its done right, on time and within budget.

Whether you live in Oakville, Hamilton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto or the surrounding area, trust your home renovation to The Renovation Monsters!
name: The Renovation Monsters

profile:
Welcome to AllSpace Garage. 
We organize, customize, and transform your garage into a usable space suited uniquely for your needs. Using high quality Proslat products we guarantee your garage will be a space you love. We specialize in bike lifts, cabinets, ski racks, storage for garden tools, shelves, flooring, and so much more. We’ll make you a custom garage with spaces for everything. With 20+ years in the renovation industry we guarantee we'll make you a garage you'll love. 
Serving the Hamilton + surrounding areas - contact us for a free quote today!

-John & Josh Nobels
905 516 9145

profile:
Our Mission is Simple
Design and build outdoor structures that work with budgets, meet deadlines, surpass expectations and enhance the lives of our customers. In today’s busy world the backyard has become underappreciated and typically commands far less attention than the inside of the home. Nothing more than a stomping ground for pets, kids and the lack luster BBQ. Sound familiar?

Build It Outback has taken the indoors out …

… for hundreds of clients. We’ve shown them the benefit of living life in the fresh air! We have achieved this by designing beautiful and functional outdoor structures that have turned forgotten about space into true Outbacks. We have a very precise goal… finish the job with excited and satisfied customers. We know that if we build quality structures at affordable prices while taking the care and time to ensure the happiness of our clients that our business will continue growing.

We are proud to say that the majority of our business comes from referrals.

profile:
If you are dreaming of the perfect outdoor living experience, you should look no further than here. We are here to build your dream deck/fence and enhance your outdoor living experience. Our team include an engineer and professional craftsmen who can design and build your deck/fence quickly and professionally while achieving perfection. Will provide you with the personal attention you deserve from first phone call through design, development and construction of your project. 

Our team have experience working on variety of materials, including composite, lumber, and cedar decks. We also work with variety of railing style such as aluminum, glass, PVC, metal and wood. 

Take the first step toward your brand new deck/fence and get in touch with us today for your free quote! 

807-355-1407

"Satisfaction in your finished project is our priority"
